item.description:
Hello my dearest German language and culture lovers!

This is a bit on the short notice, but I hope some of you will still have time to have dinner and drinks with us on the coming Friday at Andreas Restaurant on Thayer Street in Providence. This is a really yummy Greek restaurant with a relaxing atmosphere. I've been there a couple of times and their "Hot Meze Platter" is delicious :-).

I know, I know... it's Greek - not German, but trust me after the traditional Bratwurst and the Turkish Doener Kebab, Greek food is the German's favorite food :-)!

Hope to see you all on Friday!!! Please respond by Thursday night if you have time to come so I can make a reservation. Danke schoen!! :-)

Eine schoene Woche an alle!!

Bis bald, Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the girs waving a German flag!!
item.name: German meets Greek!
